name: isometric-ohio
description: Isometric pixel-art style map of OSU campus, inspired by SimCity 2000

scripts.render: npm run build -w renderer && npm run render -w renderer
scripts.render:blender: npm run build -w renderer && npm run render:blender -w renderer
scripts.postprocess: npm run build -w postprocess && npm run process -w postprocess
scripts.pyramid: npm run build -w postprocess && npm run pyramid -w postprocess
scripts.pyramid:raw: npm run build -w postprocess && npm run pyramid:raw -w postprocess
scripts.blender: npm run render:blender && npm run pyramid:raw
scripts.fetch:imagery: npm run build -w renderer && node renderer/dist/scripts/fetch-imagery.js
scripts.fetch:streetview: npm run build -w renderer && node renderer/dist/scripts/fetch-streetview.js
scripts.blender:satellite: npm run fetch:imagery && npm run render:blender && npm run pyramid:raw
scripts.blender:full: npm run fetch:imagery && npm run fetch:streetview && npm run render:blender && npm run pyramid:raw
scripts.copy:google-tiles: cp data/google-tiles/google_tiles.glb viewer/public/tiles/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No google_tiles.glb found - export from Blender first'
